# Rate of change of CPI by expense category

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, rio, here, janitor, gganimate)
```

```{r}
test <- 
  import('https://www.ine.gob.gt/sistema/uploads/2021/01/07/20210107181008hU1E5mBYrw7qBqdWxofaZsj4rULMDiJe.xls') |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  clean_names() |> 
  select(year = ano,
         month = mes, 
         id = codigo,
         desc = descripcion,
         cpi = rep) 
```

```{r}
test |> 
  filter(str_length(id) == 2) |> 
  mutate(id = as.numeric(id)) |> 
  mutate(desc = case_when(
    id == 1
  ))
```
